column2: Is situated along the Santa Barbara and Goleta coastline.
Is directly bounded by the city of Newport Beach and the community of Newport Coast.
Located 75 miles (120 km) south of San Francisco at the edge of the coastal community of Santa Cruz.
Located in LA's Westwood neighborhood, five miles from the Pacific Ocean.
UC San Diego's main campus is located near the Pacific Ocean on approximately 1,200 acres of coastal woodland in La Jolla, California.
